mapper.select: select tu.id as sendUserId, tu.username as sendUserName, tu.face_image as sendFaceImage, tu.nickname as sendNickName from friends_request fr left join t_users tu on fr.send_user_id = tu.id where fr.accept_user_id = #{acceptUserId}

select t.id as friendsUserId, t.username as friendUsername, t.nickname as friendNickName, t.face_image as friendFaceImage from my_friends mf left join t_users t on mf.my_friend_user_id = t.id where mf.my_user_id = #{userId}
